      • accumulateRFCFromExtendsClass

        private void accumulateRFCFromExtendsClass​(ClassInfo currentClassInfo,
                                           java.util.Set<java.lang.String> rfcSet)
        Recursively calculate all parent classes
        Parameters:
        currentClassInfo - current class
        rfcSet - a set of unique methods in terms of current class's RFC

      • calculateAccumulatedRFCSet

        private java.util.Set<java.lang.String> calculateAccumulatedRFCSet​(ClassInfo targetClass)
        Merge all the local methods of the parent classes and its local methods. Ideally (if JavaParaser can locate the path of dependencies to analyse), the methods are classified by their fully qualified signature, thus can be ensure that the overwritten method is unique. Need to recursively calculate all parent classes
        Parameters:
        targetClass - the class for which we are computing RFC
        Returns:
        a set of unique methods in terms of target class's RFC

        public void calculate​(ClassInfo targetClass)
